<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1383184_charityb_user_profile</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Donations count aggregate</name><order>200</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
    // Get the current donator
    var donator = current.donator;

    // Query for items submitted by this donator with auction_status = 'auction_scheduled'
    var itemGr = new GlideRecord('x_1383184_charityb_item');
    itemGr.addQuery('donator', donator);
    itemGr.addQuery('auction_status', 'auction_scheduled');
    itemGr.query();

    // Set the count of such items in user profile
    if (itemGr.hasNext()) {
        // Get user profile record
        var userProfileGr = new GlideRecord('x_1383184_charityb_user_profile');
        if (userProfileGr.get('name', donator)) {
            // Increment the count field
            userProfileGr.count+= itemGr.getRowCount();
            userProfileGr.update();
        }
    }
})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>lalitha</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-18 17:22:47</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>dcee371c936b821094e3f15a7bba1085</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Donations count aggregate</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="CharityBids" source="x_1383184_charityb">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CharityBids">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_dcee371c936b821094e3f15a7bba1085</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lalitha</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-18 17:26:41</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=dcee371c936b821094e3f15a7bba1085"/></record_update>
